item.title: [j22] Mizzix, Replica Rider
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Wizard

Flying

Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may pay {1}{U/R}. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent." (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

item.title: [j22] Ogre Battlecaster
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Shaman

First strike

Whenever Ogre Battlecaster attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard by paying {R}{R} in addition to its other costs. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. When you cast that spell, Ogre Battlecaster gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.

item.title: [j22] Plundering Predator
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Plundering Predator enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Benevolent Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

Benevolent Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on another creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 countersa re put on it instead.

{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Benevolent Hydra: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Giant Ladybug
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Reach

When Giant Ladybug enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

item.title: [j22] Rampaging Growth
item.description:
Instant

Search your library for a basic land card, put it on the battlefield, then shuffle. Until end of turn, that land becomes a 4/3 Insect creature with reach and haste. It's still a land.

item.title: [j22] Zask, Skittering Swarmlord
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Insect

You may play lands and cast Insect spells from your graveyard.

Whenever another Insect you control dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library, then mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

{1}{B/G}: Target Insect gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. ({B/G can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)

item.title: [j22] Merrow Reejerey
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Soldier

Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.

item.title: [slc] Lotus Field
item.description:
Land

Hexproof

Lotus Field enters the battlefield tapped.

When Lotus Field enters the battlefield, sacrifice two lands.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

item.title: [j22] Planar Atlas
item.description:
Artifact

Planar Atlas enters the battlefield tapped.

When Planar Atlas enters the battlefield, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [j22] Merfolk Pupil
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Wizard

When Merfolk Pupil enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

{1}{U}, Exile Merfolk Pupil from your graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.

item.title: [j22] Whirler Rogue
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Artificer

When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [j22] Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Arlinn

Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

−2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

item.title: [j22] Mild-Mannered Librarian
item.description:
Creature — Human

{3}{G}: Mild-Mannered Librarian becomes a werewolf. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and you draw a card. Activate only once.

item.title: [j22] Wicked Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

When Wicked Wolf enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wicked Wolf. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

item.title: [j22] Spectral Hunt-Caller
item.description:
Creature — Wolf Spirit

{5}{G}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Thrashing Brontodon
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

{1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [j22] Runadi, Behemoth Caller
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Shaman

Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 5 or greater, that creature enters the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it, where X is its mana value minus 4.

Creature you control with three or more +1/+1 counters on them have haste.

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [j22] Rodolf Duskbringer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Angel

Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

Whenever you gain life, Rodolf Duskbringer gains indestructible until end of turn.

At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}{W/B}. When you do, return target creature with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [j22] Feast of Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.

Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.

item.title: [j22] Oathsworn Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Knight

Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.

You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

item.title: [j22] Blood Artist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Creeping Bloodsucker
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

At the beginning of your upkeep, Creeping Bloodsucker deals 1 damage to each opponent. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

item.title: [j22] Primeval Herald
item.description:
Creature — Elf Scout

Trample

Whenever Primeval Herald enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [j22] Elvish Rejuvenator
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [j22] Leonin Warleader
item.description:
Creature — Cat Soldier

Whenever Leonin Warleader attacks, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink that are tapped and attacking.

item.title: [j22] Ajani, Strength of the Pride
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ajani

+1: You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of planeswalkers you control.

−2: Create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token named Ajani's Pridemate with "Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate."

0: If you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, exile Ajani, Strength of the Pride and each artifact and creature your opponents control.

item.title: [j22] Ajani's Pridemate
item.description:
Creature — Cat Soldier

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

item.title: [j22] Trove Warden
item.description:
Creature — Cat Beast

Vigilance

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, exile target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard.

When Trove Warden dies, put each permanent card exiled with it onto the battlefield under the control of that card's owner.

item.title: [j22] Seizan, Perverter of Truth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon Spirit

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 2 life and draws two cards.

item.title: [j22] Regal Caracal
item.description:
Creature — Cat

Other Cats you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.

When Regal Caracal enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.

item.title: [j22] Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying

Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Demon of Catastrophes
item.description:
Creature — Demon

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Flying, trample

item.title: [j22] Felidar Retreat
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Conductor of Cacophony
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Conductor of Cacophony enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Conductor of Cacophony: It deals 1 damage to each other creature and each player.

item.title: [j22] Diabolic Edict
item.description:
Instant

Target player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [j22] Disciple of Perdition
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

When Disciple of Perdition dies, choose

one. If you have exactly 13 life, you may choose both.

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Exile target opponent's graveyard. That player loses 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Infernal Idol
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {B}.

{1}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Infernal Idol: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

item.title: [j22] Ingenious Leonin
item.description:
Creature — Cat Soldier

{3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target attacking creature you control. If that creature is a Cat, it gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] King of the Pride
item.description:
Creature — Cat

Other Cats you control get +2/+1.

item.title: [j22] Renegade Demon
item.description: Creature — Demon

item.title: [j22] Peacewalker Colossus
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

{1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [j22] Lita, Mechanical Engineer
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Artificer

Vigilance

At the beginning of your end step, untap each other artifact creature you control.

{3}{W}, {T}: Create a 5/5 colorless Vehicle artifact token named Zeppelin with flying and crew 3. (It has "Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.")

item.title: [j22] Termination Facilitator
item.description:
Creature — Human Assassin

{T}: Put a bounty counter on target creature or planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is dealt damage, destroy it.

item.title: [j22] Festering Evil
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

{B}{B}, Sacrifice Festering Evil: It deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

item.title: [j22] Feast on the Fallen
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of each upkeep, if an opponent lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Uktabi Orangutan
item.description:
Creature — Ape

When Uktabi Orangutan enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

item.title: [j22] Dread Presence
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare

Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Dread Presence deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [j22] Towering Gibbon
item.description:
Creature — Ape

Reach

Towering Gibbon's power is equal to the greatest mana value among creatures you control.

item.title: [j22] Magnifying Glass
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
